11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_GAIN_CONTROLLER2_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_GAIN_CONTROLLER2_H_
13
14#include <memory>
15#include <string>
16
17#include "modules/audio_processing/agc2/adaptive_agc.h"
18#include "modules/audio_processing/agc2/gain_applier.h"
19#include "modules/audio_processing/agc2/limiter.h"
20#include "modules/audio_processing/include/audio_processing.h"
21#include "modules/audio_processing/logging/apm_data_dumper.h"
22#include "rtc_base/constructor_magic.h"
23
24namespace webrtc {
25
26class AudioBuffer;
27
28// Gain Controller 2 aims to automatically adjust levels by acting on the
29// microphone gain and/or applying digital gain.
30class GainController2 {
31 public:
32 GainController2();
33 GainController2(const GainController2&) = delete;
34 GainController2& operator=(const GainController2&) = delete;
35 ~GainController2();
36
37 void Initialize(int sample_rate_hz, int num_channels);
38 void Process(AudioBuffer* audio);
39 void NotifyAnalogLevel(int level);
40
41 void ApplyConfig(const AudioProcessing::Config::GainController2& config);
42 static bool Validate(const AudioProcessing::Config::GainController2& config);
43
44 private:
45 static int instance_count_;
46 ApmDataDumper data_dumper_;
47 AudioProcessing::Config::GainController2 config_;
48 GainApplier gain_applier_;
49 std::unique_ptr<AdaptiveAgc> adaptive_agc_;
50 Limiter limiter_;
51 int calls_since_last_limiter_log_;
52 int analog_level_ = -1;
53};
54
55} // namespace webrtc
56
57#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_GAIN_CONTROLLER2_H_
58
